about_the_game:
Proudly presenting you a free mini-DLC perfect for Halloween season!
This free mini-pack contains walking graphics of Pumpkin Heads (aka Jack-o’-Lantern men) and mummies!
Perfect for Halloween related scenes or general horror scenes!

＜Contents＞
character: 2
